meanings.definition: Behavior or actions that are morally or socially unacceptable.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was shocked by the indecencies displayed by the students in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The community was outraged by the indecencies shown during the public event.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show humorously exaggerated the indecencies of the characters for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The movie portrayed the indecencies of society through a powerful and thought-provoking lens.
meanings.sent5: The book vividly described the indecencies of the corrupt politician.

meanings.definition: Acts or words that are offensive or inappropriate.
meanings.sent1: The company had strict policies against any indecencies in the workplace.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's jokes crossed the line into indecencies, causing discomfort among the audience.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the accidental indecencies of the cartoon character on TV.
meanings.sent4: The artist used bold colors to represent the indecencies of society in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The news report highlighted the indecencies of the scandalous celebrity.
